name: SkyFire
description:
War has come to the skies over your homeland, and don't you feel an idiot for spending the military budget on social housing and universal healthcare. But as your Gran used to say, it's not what you've got but what you do with it that counts. So dust-off your air force's plane, get up into the wide blue yonder, and give the other fellas hell!

SkyFire is a classic retro scrolling shoot-em-up featuring endless waves of enemies. Play here in your browser or download for desktop.

Controls

Movement: Q, A, O, P; arrow keys; D-pad
Fire: SPACE; A or B button
Music on/off: M

Credits

Code by SJC
Graphics "Pixel Shmup" by Kenney
Music "NES Shooter Music" by SketchyLogic
Font "Trouble" by DamienG

Suggestion

The downloads aren't code-signed, so for the best experience, download via the itch.io app.
